summary: Comprehensive testing of TecaiKids educational platform completed. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend is working excellently with professional design, responsive layout, and smooth user experience. Multi-step enrollment form works perfectly. Minor UI interaction issue found with consultation form dropdown selection.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown selection has interaction issues - clicking options is intercepted by other elements
ui_bugs.details: Radix UI Select component has complex event handling that prevents normal click interactions. Keyboard navigation works as alternative.
ui_bugs.workaround: Users can use keyboard navigation (arrow keys + enter) to select options
